about_the_game:
Adrenaline fueled, fast paced combat with a satisfying twist


Battle your friends by yeeting, dashing, and flying around an arena with devastating strength and speed!
YEET is a cross-play PvP game about throwing giant objects at other players in an arena. Flatscreen and VR players are all able to play with each other for a seamless experience.

Features available on Launch:


The aim of the game is to simply throw objects at other players in an effort to destroy them. When you are hit by an object, you will die. It's that simple.

Player controls and Interaction
Take control of a gladiator robot, where you can fly with your jetpack, dash to dodge obstacles, and pick-up and throw objects with your own robot hands! During gameplay you will be able to pick-up objects, throw them, and even steal them from enemies by simply grabbing them yourself. Be careful though, as even objects you throw can be dangerous.

Multiple Arenas
On launch, you will be able to play in three different arenas, with multiple different gamemodes. These gamemodes include an endless mode, lives mode, team deathmatch, hide and seek, and infected.

Dynamic objects and environments
YEET is designed to be a fast-paced online game, and therefore features many dynamic objects and environments. Throwable objects are of different shapes and sizes, some objects will explode on impact, and some will even move to target the player and seek to destroy them! All objects are throwable, so there is no escaping the mayhem!

Online Cross-play
Online multiplayer supports VR and flatscreen players at the same time, so YEET is designed to be balanced to play on both platforms.

YEET is an experimental game coming soon.

name: YEET

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • VR Support: OpenXR; requires motion controllers to play VR

short_description: Adrenaline fueled, fast paced combat with a satisfying twist. Battle your friends by yeeting, dashing, and flying around an arena with devastating strength and speed!
